overview:
As Technology Director, Simon Jia brings over 7 years of Web development and leadership to Magnify360. In addition to leading the Company’s technology team and projects, Simon serves as the liaison between magnify360â€™s Shanghai technology development team and the Los Angeles offices, where the Companyâ€™s product and services teams are located.

Previously, Simon was employed as the Chief Technology Officer at U-Phone Corporation, a privately held telecommunications company.
